description: A high-level Go module for interacting with the GitHub API

highlights.description: Breaking change release: removed backward compatibility layer from v0.3.0
Relocated constants to more appropriate packages for better code organization
Improved error handling with `AuthError.Unwrap()` for error chain compatibility

breaking.description: Removed `Client` type from root package - use `auth.NewGitHubClient()` + subpackage clients
Removed `NewClient()` and `NewClientWithToken()` from root package - use `auth.NewGitHubClient()`
Removed type aliases (`Query`, `Issues`, `Issue`) from root package - import from `search` package
Removed re-exported constants (`ParamUser`, `ParamState`, etc.) from root package - import from `search` package
Removed wrapper methods (`SearchOpenPullRequests`, `SearchIssues`, `SearchIssuesAll`) from root package - use `search.Client` methods
Moved `BaseURLRepoAPI` and `BaseURLRepoHTML` from `search` to root `gogithub` package

added.description: `AuthError.Unwrap()` method for Go 1.13+ error chain compatibility

changed.description: Root package now contains only package documentation and URL constants
Bot user constants (`UsernameDependabot`, `UserIDDependabot`) now in `auth` package
URL constants (`BaseURLRepoAPI`, `BaseURLRepoHTML`) now in root `gogithub` package
`search/issues.go` now imports URL constants from root package

fixed.description: `Query.Encode()` now produces deterministic output by sorting keys

removed.description: Removed `Client` type wrapper from root package
Removed `NewClient()` factory function from root package
Removed `NewClientWithToken()` factory function from root package
Removed `Query`, `Issues`, `Issue` type aliases from root package
Removed all re-exported constants from root package
Removed `SearchOpenPullRequests()`, `SearchIssues()`, `SearchIssuesAll()` wrapper methods from root package

documentation.description: Updated ROADMAP.md marking v0.4.0 breaking changes as completed

highlights.description: Major architecture refactor: reorganized into modular subpackages by operation type
Added comprehensive GitHub API operations for repositories, pull requests, and releases
Maintained backward compatibility with v0.2.x API (deprecated, will be removed in v0.4.0)

added.description: New `errors` package with standard error types (`ErrNotFound`, `ErrPermissionDenied`, `ErrRateLimited`, etc.) and `Translate` function
New `config` package with `Config` struct, `FromEnv`, `FromEnvWithConfig`, GitHub Enterprise support
New `search` package with `Client`, `SearchIssues`, `SearchIssuesAll`, `Query` builder, and `Issues` type with table generation
New `repo` package with commit operations (`CreateCommit`, `ReadLocalFiles`, `FileContent` type)
New `repo` package with batch operations (`Batch` type for atomic multi-file commits)
Example command `cmd/searchuserpr` for searching user pull requests

changed.description: Reorganized codebase from flat package structure to modular subpackages by operation type
Root package now provides backward-compatible re-exports delegating to subpackages

deprecated.description: Root package `Client` type - use `auth.NewGitHubClient` and subpackage clients directly
Root package type aliases (`Query`, `Issues`, `Issue`) - import from `search` package directly
Root package constant re-exports (`ParamUser`, `ParamState`, etc.) - import from `search` package directly
Root package wrapper methods (`SearchOpenPullRequests`, `SearchIssues`, `SearchIssuesAll`) - use `search.Client` methods directly

documentation.description: Updated README with new modular package structure and usage examples
Added RELEASE_NOTES_v0.3.0.md with comprehensive release documentation
Added ROADMAP.json and ROADMAP.md with project roadmap and v0.4.0 deprecation plan
Added missing v0.3.0 packages to README documentation

added.description: `Issues` type with table generation for reporting
